body_html: @Saleem44 you can safely ignore that warning. It just states that the notebook accepts incoming connection on all ports. That could be a security issue in case the host of the notebook session (the docker container in this case) was connected directly to the internet. That shouldn't be the case under normal circumstances.

body: @Saleem44 you can safely ignore that warning. It just states that the notebook accepts incoming connection on all ports. That **could** be a security issue in case the host of the notebook session (the docker container in this case) was connected directly to the internet. That shouldn't be the case under normal circumstances.
